General.Name: PT Cerestar Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Cerestar Indonesia Tbk produces, processes, and sells wheat flour in Indonesia. It offers wheat flour for food and bakery ingredients; and bran and pollard, which can be used as raw materials for animal feed. The company sells its products under the Falcon, Seagull, Dragonfly, Bakerstar, Prama, Manta, and Starfish brands. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Cerestar Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Sunterra Indonesia.
General.Address: The City Tower Lt. 28, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10310
